meta.description: Optimize the transportation of patients to the hospital using helicopters and buses to minimize total time.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_MODES
sets.description: Modes of transport available for patient transportation.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Number of patients each transport mode can carry per trip.

params.name: time_per_trip
params.description: Time taken per trip for each transport mode in hours.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each transport mode.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.description: Minimize the total time to transport all patients.

constraints.name: min_patients
constraints.description: At least 120 patients need to be transported.

constraints.name: min_helicopter_trips
constraints.description: At least 30% of the trips should be by helicopter.

constraints.name: max_bus_trips
constraints.description: There can be at most 10 bus trips.
